DOC.brief_title: Acute Recanalization Thrombo-Embolic Ischemic Stroke With pREset ( ARTESp )
DOC.detailed_description: ARTESp prospective multicenter study pREset thrombectomy system ( phenox GmbH Germany ) examine . The effectiveness , safety long-term success use pREset treat acute occlusion cerebral vessel analyze . In study market-approved , self-expandable stent retriever ( pREset , phenox GmbH , Germany ) use achieve direct flow recovery . The thrombectomy system unfold directly vessel occlusion . In second step , system thrombus pull back guide catheter . It plan enroll 100 patient age 18 85 year , NIHSS ( National Institutes Health Stroke Scale ) ≥ 8 ≤ 30 . The precondition study enrollment write consent patient legal representative fulfillment mention inclusion exclusion criterion . Pregnant woman exclude study participation.The clinical intervention accordance clinical standard care treatment patient population . The mRS ( Modified Rankin Scale ) day 30 , NIHSS day 90 imaging procedure day 90 may perform study site provide corresponds clinical standard study site .
